short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows notifcation with translated Finnish words

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small extension that will show a browser notification every time you stop your mouse over a Finnish word. It will look up the word's base form and translate it to English. A great way to learn Finnish by reading websites and looking up unknown words on the fly.

New in 1.8
- fix bugs in uppercase word lookup

New in 1.6
- ensure notification duration to 15s
- remove deprecated text range methods

New in 1.5
- Improved chrome word lookup under mouse cursor

New in 1.4
- Fixed the icon toggler
- Remove duplicate translations

New in 1.3
- works now with https websites

New in 1.2
- better display of translations
- better display of compound words
- added links to verbix, sanakirja and wiktionary where appropriate
